job.script:
echo SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_VARIABLE_1=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_VARIABLE_1 echo SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_VARIABLE_2=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_VARIABLE_2 echo SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_VARIABLE_3=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SAMPLE_VARIABLE_3
echo sample_shell_all= sample_shell_all: $(date +"%Y%m%d %T %N")>>$SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES
echo sample_shell_now= sample_shell_now: $(date +"%Y%m%d %T %N")>>$SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES echo sample_shell_a = sample_shell_a: $(date +"%Y%m%d %T %N")>>$SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES
